newsitem.title: USA: RJR, Philip Morris bonds tighten on tobacco ruling.
newsitem.headline: RJR, Philip Morris bonds tighten on tobacco ruling.

text.p: Bonds of tobacco firms, Philip Morris Cos Inc and RJR Nabisco Holdings Corp unit, RJ Reynolds Tobacco Co tightened five basis points after news of a favorable ruling for the industry, traders said.
"RJR and Philip Morris' bonds improved by about five basis points after news of the tobacco verdict hit the market," said one high-grade trader.
RJR's 8.75 percent paper due 2005 tightened to a 240 bid, 225 offer, traders said.
